sentences.en: According to MichelFoucault's theory of discourse instigation, suppression definitely goes to an instigation.
sentences.cn: 按照福柯的“话语煽动”理论, 压抑的结果必然是煽动.

sentences.en: Although the relation between general and individual, not all entrapment belong to attempted instigation.
sentences.cn: 陷害教唆与侦查圈套有着天然的伴生关系, 但并非所有的侦查圈套都属于陷害教唆之情形.

sentences.en: An appeal fund was launched at the instigation of the President.
sentences.cn: 总统授意发起了一项救援基金。

sentences.en: At his instigation we conceal the fact from the authorities.
sentences.cn: 我们受他的怂恿向当局隐瞒了事实.

sentences.en: At Kukhar's instigation he joined the restaurant as an apprentice chef.
sentences.cn: 在库哈里的鼓动下，他到餐馆做了厨师学徒。

sentences.en: At Merlin's instigation, Arthur founds the Fellowship of the Round Table.
sentences.cn: 在梅林的建议下，亚瑟王创建了圆桌骑士团。

sentences.en: First, at my instigation, we repaired to an artists’ colony in France; then spent three months in Paris.
sentences.cn: 起先，在我鼓动下，我们搬到法国的一个艺术家聚居地；然后在巴黎过了三个月。

sentences.en: The governing body of world football, Fifa, has opened ethics proceedings against its president Sepp Blatter at the instigation of his rival for the Fifa leadership Mohamed Bin Hammam.
sentences.cn: 世界足球管理机构,即国际足联开始对主席塞普•布拉特(Sepp Blatter)进行道德审查程序。 这是由于竞选足联主席的对手哈曼(Mohamed Bin Hammam)的煽动。

sentences.en: The riot broke out at the instigation of a certain politician.
sentences.cn: 这场暴乱是在某政客的扇动下发生的.

sentences.en: The stringent requirements of these examples stand in stark contrast to the instigation offence.
sentences.cn: 上述例子的严格规定与鼓动罪行的规定构成明显的对比.
